entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 10:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -25.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -30.8°C
Wind: W 43 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
